A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best Star Wars movies in my opinion. The characters are complex and it shows great character development throughout the entire film. Everyone that’s bashing on it really didn’t see the beauty of the message that the Last Jedi brings. Adam Driver\, Daisy Ridley\, and Mark Hamill are absolutely amazing representing their characters. This takes Star Wars into a new direction\, and I think it’s a direction fans should get behind. If you’re worried about watching because of these ratings\, don’t. Watch the movie because it’s moving in all the ways that Star Wars can be.
